title: Apple bread pudding with vanilla sauce
ingredients: ['Pudding', '150g thick, soft bread, sliced into cubes', '40g raisins', '225g peeled and sliced apples', '220g brown sugar', '425ml milk', '60g butter', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 eggs, beaten', 'Vanilla sauce', '50g caster sugar', '60g soft brown sugar', '120ml milk', '100g butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
